title: What did The Weeknd mean in his lyric 'bring the 707 out'? - Quora

response.answer_text: 707 is a glass table made by Boeing. It’s a rather expensive table, especially for someone without a stable home to be investing in. However, Abel used this furniture for snorting lines of cocaine.  707 may also refer to the Roland TR-707 drum machine, which was probably used in the making of this track. 707 is also the chemical name for glass cleaners (e.g. Windex) most likely used to clean the tables after snorting lines of coke.
